results.title: SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@Tachycardia@@@ was entrained and all the maneuvers were in accordance with @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Atrioventricular_Nodal_Reentry</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013611 @@@atrioventricular reentry tachycardia@@@.

citations.NLM: Krmek N, Jegdić V, Rode M. SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY. Acta Clin Croat. 2024 Apr;63(1):197-202. PMID: 39959329
citations.BibTeX: @article{39959329, title={SUCCESSFUL ABLATION OF CONCEALED ACCESSORY PATHWAY MEDIATED SUPRAVENTRICULAR TACHYCARDIA IN A 5-YEAR-OLD CHILD WITH EBSTEIN ANOMALY.}, author={Krmek N and Jegdić V and Rode M}, journal={Acta Clin Croat}, volume={63}, number={1}, pages={197-202}}

results.title: [Atenolol for preventing recurrence of atrioventricular reentry tachycardia in childhood].
results.text_hl: [@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ for preventing recurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Atrioventricular_Nodal_Reentry</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013611 @@@atrioventricular reentry tachycardia@@@ in childhood].

citations.NLM: Pfammatter JP, Weber JW, Stocker FP. [Atenolol for preventing recurrence of atrioventricular reentry tachycardia in childhood]. Klin Padiatr. 1998 Sep-Oct;210(5):358-62. PMID: 9782480
citations.BibTeX: @article{9782480, title={[Atenolol for preventing recurrence of atrioventricular reentry tachycardia in childhood].}, author={Pfammatter JP and Weber JW and Stocker FP}, journal={Klin Padiatr}, volume={210}, number={5}, pages={358-62}}

results.title: Long-term efficacy and safety of beta-adrenergic receptor antagonists for supraventricular tachycardia.
results.text_hl: Oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ prevented induction of @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Atrioventricular_Nodal_Reentry</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013611 @@@atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia@@@ in 4 of 5 (80%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ responding to intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and none of these 4 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ experienced a clinical recurrence.

citations.NLM: Lindsay BD, Saksena S, Rothbart ST, Herman S, Barr MJ. Long-term efficacy and safety of beta-adrenergic receptor antagonists for supraventricular tachycardia. Am J Cardiol. 1987 Aug 31;60(6):63D-67D. PMID: 2888301
citations.BibTeX: @article{2888301, title={Long-term efficacy and safety of beta-adrenergic receptor antagonists for supraventricular tachycardia.}, author={Lindsay BD and Saksena S and Rothbart ST and Herman S and Barr MJ}, journal={Am J Cardiol}, volume={60}, number={6}, pages={63D-67D}}

results.title: Effects of atenolol in patients with reciprocating supraventricular tachycardia.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@Tachycardia@@@ was due to reciprocation within the atrioventricular node in 9 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, and to pre-excitation in 3 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ slowed the sinus rate, prolonged the atrioventricular conduction time, and increased the atrial cycle length at which @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Atrioventricular_Nodal_Reentry</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013611 @@@atrioventricular nodal Wenckebach phenomenon@@@ occurred.

citations.NLM: Pimenta J, Pereira CB. Effects of atenolol in patients with reciprocating supraventricular tachycardia. Clin Cardiol. 1986 May;9(5):191-5. PMID: 3708945
citations.BibTeX: @article{3708945, title={Effects of atenolol in patients with reciprocating supraventricular tachycardia.}, author={Pimenta J and Pereira CB}, journal={Clin Cardiol}, volume={9}, number={5}, pages={191-5}}

results.title: Atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia initiated by catecholamine-induced ventricular tachycardia. A case report.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was effectively treated with a combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@.

citations.NLM: Mann DE, Marmont P, Shultz J, Reiter MJ. Atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia initiated by catecholamine-induced ventricular tachycardia. A case report. J Electrocardiol. 1991 Apr;24(2):191-5. PMID: 2037821
citations.BibTeX: @article{2037821, title={Atrioventricular nodal reentrant tachycardia initiated by catecholamine-induced ventricular tachycardia. A case report.}, author={Mann DE and Marmont P and Shultz J and Reiter MJ}, journal={J Electrocardiol}, volume={24}, number={2}, pages={191-5}}

results.title: Antiarrhythmic effects of acute betablockade with atenolol on supraventricular tachycardias at rest and during exercise.
results.text_hl: Antiarrhythmic effects of acute betablockade with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@supraventricular tachycardias@@@ at rest and during exercise.
